stack wrote:
> vrbuaacn wrote:
> 
>>Hi,all
>>  I am using heritrix 1.6.0 on Windows 2000 professional and met a
>>problem when create a new job and start crawling. The local-
>>errors.log showed the following message:
>>
>>  2005-12-22T03:07:45.281Z    -2          - http://xx.xx.xx/ - - no-
>>type #002 - - -
>>java.io.IOException: Failed to get host vrlab.buaa.edu.cn address
>>from ServerCache
> 
> 
> Does it happen for all hosts or just 'vrlab.buaa.edu.cn'?  Can you 
> reproduce?
> St.Ack

Also:

Have you reordered or removed any of the standard Processor steps --
expecially PreconditionEnforcer? That Processor usually ensures a
DNS URI to lookup each host gets processed before the corresponding
HTTP URIs. If it was missing, I would expect an error like what you're
seeing.

If that's not the cause, I would look in all the logs, including
heritrix_out.log, for any earlier errors that might explain why
the usual lookup hadn't occurred.

- Gordon @ IA
